content: front loops of r14 r1­ 1dc into each st around 32dc r2­ 1dc into each st around 32dc r3­ you will be creating a small bump with the last row put your hook in the next stitch then down into the 3rd bar of r1 than single_crochet continue with this single_crochet all the way around r2 should be bubbled out 32sc r4­ ruffle 1hdc 3dc 1hdc all into the same st 1sc into next 2 st repeat x9 decrease 1hdc 3dc 1hdc into next st 1sc slipst to join and f/o 11 ruffles turn work over upper skirt ​ attach color b to r9 of the crown r1­ 1dc into each st 64dc f/o color b r2­ attach color d in any space between the double_crochet 7dc in that space *skip 5dc 7dc into the next space between dcs 13dc clusters f/o color d r3­ attach color c to any 3rd double_crochet of the 7dc clusters and single_crochet * 7dc in the space between clusters of r2 1sc into the top of next cluster* repeat around 13 double_crochet clusters + 13 single_crochet f/o color c r4­ with color b 1hdc into each st around 102 half_double_crochet tentacles ​ i made 4 spiral tentacles and put sewed them in the middle i made 4 straight tentacles in each color and sewed them above and below the lower skirt and lastly i cut long strands of yarn and attached wherever for filler spiral tentacles ​ i did 1 large 1 med and 2 small all are made the same way with different chs starting with a long tail for sewing chain 102 90 80 80 3hdc into 3rd st from the hook *1hdc in the next 3hdc in the next* repeat until ⅓ of the way up the chain than *1dc in the next st 3dcs in the next* repeat another ⅓ the last ⅓ *1treb in the next st 3treb in the next st* f/o for the next tentacles don t use treb crochets just uses half_double_crochet and double_crochet straight tentacles ​ starting with a long tail chain 71 slipst in the 2nd chain from the hook and continue slipst all the way up the chain to the top and f/o sew on all tentacles to the bottom side of your jelly use your judgement and have fun the color changes were to my liking change color any way you like every jelly is unique
